definition: simple and unadorned (of art, architecture etc)
surname Piao/Korean surname (Park, Pak, or Bak)/also pr. [Pu2]

sentences.english: The Seal, solid in configuration, is simple and honest, majestic and supreme.
sentences.chinese: 印章构型稳固，古朴敦厚，大气浑然，至尊无上。

sentences.english: With its simple artistic style and layout of the science and art of famous in the world.
sentences.chinese: 它以其古朴的艺术风格和科学的布局艺术闻名于世。

sentences.english: This chair was novel in its combination of visually austere form with high-level seating comfort.
sentences.chinese: 这张椅子的新颖之处在于它古朴的造型及舒适的坐感。

sentences.english: The ancient simple pile-dwellings of Miao lie on the green slopes.
sentences.chinese: 古朴的吊角楼斜倚在绿色的山坡上。

sentences.english: For millennia, Han Chinese clothing retained its simple and elegant style.
sentences.chinese: 几千年来，汉服保留了其古朴典雅的风格。

sentences.english: XX has characteristic in Chinese traditional residence with its black brick, simple and unsophisticated and elegance.
sentences.chinese: XX博物馆青砖灰瓦，古朴典雅，乃传统居民特色。

sentences.english: The fruit of the cupuaçu tree is a source of oil celebrated for its moisturizing qualities.
sentences.chinese: 古朴阿苏树果实是一种以滋润品质著称的油的来源。

sentences.english: The droplight appearance of primitive simplicity with marble qualitative material, gift lamplight of a kind of massiness quiet.
sentences.chinese: 云石材质的吊灯外形古朴，赋予灯光一种厚重的安宁。

sentences.english: Baoding entire ancient dignified, magnify very ambitious.
sentences.chinese: 全部宝鼎古朴凝重，气魄弘大，非常宏伟。

sentences.english: Here are quaint shops lining folk customs.
sentences.chinese: 这里铺衬的都是古朴的民风。

sentences.english: The ancient Diaojiao Lou is reclining on green slopes.
sentences.chinese: 古朴的吊角楼斜倚在绿色的山坡上。

sentences.english: Dong Zhen of a 12 ancient spectacular proudly stand upright on the main road on both sides.
sentences.chinese: 洞真观有12棵古朴壮观的傲然挺立于主路两侧。

sentences.english: The old gentleman had on a classic suit.
sentences.chinese: 那位老年绅士穿著一套古朴的传统服装。

sentences.english: Majestic simplicity, condescending , overlooking the entire Temple, the main temple building.
sentences.chinese: 雄伟古朴，居高临下，俯瞰全寺，为寺内主要建筑。

definition: interesting and appealing (of old locations, objects etc)
in picturesque disorder (idiom); irregular arrangement with charming effect
variant of 別緻|别致[bie2 zhi4]
implicit charm in rhyme or sound/hinted appeal/interest
